geometry.planar

Class OrthogonalBoundingDirections

  • java.lang.Object
    • geometry.planar.OrthogonalBoundingDirections
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ShapeBoundingDirections

    public class OrthogonalBoundingDirections
extends java.lang.Object
implements ShapeBoundingDirections
    Implements the abstract class ShapeDirections as the 4 orthogonal directions. The class is a singleton with the only instanciation INSTANCE.
    Version:
    $Id: $Id
    Author:
    Alfons Wirtz
